i bought my hawaiin shorts 2day!! a orange wan to add to my collection! muahahahahahhahaha 2moro najia my darling gonna bring fer me skirt..alalala ahrite...

i just love this soo much.... thanx to sabby..hahaha i still kept it! Saya seorang bakti, Saya koluthu uthupathy , Dia mari uuthy ammechi, Saya sangat sakit hati, Saya ambil periya katti, Saya kutthi, Dia mati............ Saya kutthi Dia mati, Saya buat satu peti, Korek lubang guna mahmuthi, Buat sama dia satu sammathi, Ambil satu nereppathi, Bakar dia sampai mati, Bakar dia sudah mati, Habuk kasi his pondati, Lalu dia sakit hati, Marah saya dey kamnati.....

Y Y Y hmmmmmm wat m i to say i wanted to write bout a certain sumone but i think i shall not fer noe la....i dunno la wats happening?! im lost and confused why must i go through all this pain? (wah drama wei)i mean like hello...isnt it like SO obvious like wats going on!! go hit urself on the head with a hammer la! :p lalala i get so nervous evertime im around you. you are my only luv my true love i haf finally found you but why oh why cant u see that everybody noes bout it already but YOU just dunt seem to do nething bout the whole situation! i need you i cant live without you i must have you by my side everyday every second of my life you are my air. *who am i talking about i aso dunt noe i simply only DRAMA. nothing else better to do....* NO NO WAIT THE PERSON IS ME -KUBZ- no i dunt have ne1 in my life n i dunt like ne1 fer NOW! its all a VERY complecating thing to go through...all u ever end up with are HEART BREAKS and buckets full of wasted TEARS! so there u have it i LOVE only MYSELF and no1 else!

wow wat a day it was 2day...my mummy was in a accident... but luckily nothing happend to her *phew* but my KANCIL is damaged :( its totally wrecked. now i got no car to practice with :( oh well wat to do... hmm lets see i've got my new specs!! woohoo!! my power decrease so yeah thats a good sign! ...umm SKOOL was fun 2day (umm really ahh?!) haha i dunno wat to post just post aje la rite....so lalalala i cant wait fer SATURDAY!! y well wait fer my sundays post la...muahahahahaha

i soo totally dunt noe wats going on all i wanted to do was post a comment on joeys blog ..but sumhow i got myself into this?!! ok yeah like wateva la..i totally dunt noe wat to write so yeah thats that! umm wat m i xactly suppose to publish here? my inner thoughts? ee wat? im LOST always haf been n always will be .. so my wonderfUl friends PLEASE bear with my crazeeness n blurness ...muahahahahaha oh wait lemme say sumthing bout our FORM6 edu trip to NTV7 today....it was boring well not really la the BUS ride was FUN hahaha i actually had fun in a BUS!! how weird! n some spokesmodel those "chicks" were!! Shaun digs that Sarah girl...hahaha she no behind la wat la! the first girl was BETTER! i luved the cameras!! mauhahaha n im really HUNGRY now...all i wan is some FOOD.....*saliva* all over the keyboard! ok hmmmmmmmmmm im bored so i guess i'll post this n post a comment in joeys blog n go do some bio so thanx fer ur time n always rememba the most important thing in LIFE is that KUBIE RAWKZ take care PEAce out ya'll
